attributes.action: Young Drivers For Lower Insurance Premiums
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to clamp down on insurance companies charging ridiculous prices for some of the least well off people in society. We're at university, working or trying to make a difference and our bank accounts are being sabotaged by greedy insurance companies. We should have the lowest rates available - make vehicle ownership more accessible to people who are trying to better themselves, rather than preventing them!
